name: Cucumber-Ruby
body:
## Installation Setup - MAC

* Install Ruby - brew install ruby
* Install Cucumber - gem install cucumber
* Install Capybara - gem install capybara
* Install Selenium webdriver - gem install selenium-webdriver
* Install Rspec - gem install rspec

## Installation Setup for Windows

* Install Ruby - [Ruby Installer](http://rubyinstaller.org/)
* Install Cucumber - gem install cucumber
* Install Capybara - gem install capybara
* Install selenium webdriver - gem install selenium-webdriver
* Install rspec - gem install rspec

## References

* Cucumber - [The Cucumber Book](https://www.google.co.in/url?sa=t&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=web&cd=1&cad=rja&uact=8&ved=0ahUKEwirtvWf76jLAhVKCY4KHThVAcUQFggbMAA&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwiki.kuali.org%2Fdownload%2Fattachments%2F329384409%2FThe%2520Cucumber%2520Book.pdf%3Fversion%3D1%26modificationDate%3D1407504510000%26api%3Dv2&usg=AFQjCNEwixnbrWYSEM1teUwGcUIZDO8_0g&sig2=q5nKSM_mzfH9bQ5u4v2oiw)
* Capybara - [Cheat Sheet](https://gist.github.com/zhengjia/428105)



Step Definitions

Given(/^I go to bookmyshow website$/) do
	visit "https://in.bookmyshow.com/chennai"
end

Then(/^I verify the experiences link is available$/) do
  find("//a[contains(@href,'http://in.bookmyshow.com/chennai/experiences/')]").text.should eq("EXPERIENCES")
end

Given(/^I maximize browser$/) do
    page.driver.browser.manage.window.maximize
end

When(/^I click on the signin link$/) do
  find(".//*[@id='preSignIn']").click
end

When(/^I enter the username as "([^"]*)"$/) do |username|
  find(".//*[@id='iUserName']").set username
end

When(/^I enter the password as "([^"]*)"$/) do |password|
  find(".//*[@id='iPwd']").set password
end

And(/^I click on the sign in button$/) do
  find(".//*[@id='iUserNameParent']/a/div").click
end


Then(/^I verify the error text as "([^"]*)"$/) do |errortext|
 find(".//*[@id='dSignInErrorPassword']/span[2]").text.should have_text(errortext)
end


##Features

Feature: Testing the bookmyshow website

	Background:
		Given I go to bookmyshow website
		And I maximize browser
	
	Scenario: As a user, I want to visit the bookmyshow website
		Then I verify the experiences link is available


	Scenario: As a user, I want to be notified with the error text for wrong credentials
	When I click on the signin link
	And I enter the username as "xyz@gmail.com"
	And I enter the password as "xyz"
	And I click on the sign in button
	Then I verify the error text as "The username or password you have entered is incorrect"
